nodes.text: The Ardroxia system was located in the Halla sector, a part of the Kashyyyk Region in the Slice portion of the Mid Rim. The system was the origin point of the Ardroxian Flu.
The Ardroxia system was established in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which placed the system in grid square R-9.
